sentences.en: a clockwise direction
sentences.cn: 顺时针方向

sentences.en: As the heat increases, the young hurricane begins to swirl in a counter - clockwise motion.
sentences.cn: 随着热量的增加, 新生的飓风即开始以 逆时针 方向旋转.

sentences.en: As the rotor turns clockwise the charge is sealed off and compression begins.
sentences.cn: 当转子顺时针方向转动时,送进的气团就被封闭,并开始压缩.

sentences.en: Do the vanes in the figure rotate clockwise or counterclockwise?
sentences.cn: 图中叶片的旋转方向是顺时针的,还是反时针的?

sentences.en: Gently swing your right arm in a clockwise direction.
sentences.cn: 按顺时针方向轻轻摆动右臂。

sentences.en: He told the children to start moving clockwise around the room.
sentences.cn: 他让孩子们开始按顺时针方向绕着房间走。

sentences.en: Landscape orientation, clockwise from the portrait orientation.
sentences.cn: 横向取向。从纵向顺时针旋转。

sentences.en: Please turn the key in a clockwise direction.
sentences.cn: 请顺时针转动钥匙.

sentences.en: Positive aileron deflection produces an anti - clockwise moment about the X axis.
sentences.cn: 正的副翼偏转角产生绕X轴的负方向力矩.

sentences.en: Positive frequencies are produced by anticlockwise rotation and negative frequencies by clockwise rotation.
sentences.cn: 正频率是用逆时针旋转来产生,而负频率是用顺时针旋转来产生.

sentences.en: Rotate the head clockwise and counterclockwise.
sentences.cn: 按顺时针方向转动头部，然后再逆时针旋转。

sentences.en: Screw the lid on clockwise.
sentences.cn: 按顺时针方向拧紧盖子。

sentences.en: The canoo whirled round, clockwise, then widdershins.
sentences.cn: 独木舟转呀转, 先顺时钟, 然后逆时钟.

sentences.en: The dance moves in a counter-clockwise direction.
sentences.cn: 这支舞是按逆时针方向跳的。

sentences.en: The genetic code decides whether they sit with a slight twist towards clockwise or anticlockwise.
sentences.cn: 基因密码决定了它们的排列是稍稍向顺时针方向还是向逆时针方向扭曲。

sentences.en: The helicopter flew in a clockwise circuit around them.
sentences.cn: 直升机按顺时针方向绕着他们飞行.

sentences.en: Trend is the direction of the horizontal projection of a line, measured clockwise from north.
sentences.cn: 线倾向:它是直线水平投影的方向, 自正北顺时针度量.

sentences.en: Turn the key clockwise.
sentences.cn: 顺时针方向转动钥匙。

sentences.en: Yes, so I say to them, I tell them if you do not understand, just have a look watch, clockwise to go where where is clockwise, which in turn is counterclockwise.
sentences.cn: 是，我也是这么对他们说的，我告诉他们如果还不明白就看看手表，时针往哪儿走哪儿就是顺时针，反过来就是逆时针。

sentences.en: You should turn the key clockwise to open the door.
sentences.cn: 你应该按顺时针方向转动钥匙来开门.

trans.tran_en: in the same direction as the hands of a clock move
